ctl:test.name: wcs2:req24
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req24:Send a valid GetCoverage request to the server under test and check that the response is not an exception.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req25
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req25:Send a valid GetCoverage request to server under test which conforms to the references in the requirement. Check that the response is not an exception.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req26
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req26: Send valid GetCoverage requests to server under test addressing existing and non-existing coverages, resp. Check if appropriate results or excep-tions, resp., are delivered.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req27
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req27:Send valid GetCoverage subsetting requests on all coverages on the server on hand. Check that for the disallowed subtypes an exception is returned and for the allowed subtypes a non-exception response.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req28
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req28:Every dimension value in a GetCoverage request shall be equal to one of the axisLabels dimension names specified in the gml:SRSInformationGroup of the coverage gml:Envelope, unless the server offers a WCS CRS extension which overrides this requirement.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req29
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req29:A GetCoverage request shall contain at most one subsetting operation for each of the dimensions of the coverage addressed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req30
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req30:Send otherwise valid GetCoverage requests with matching and with violat-ing trimming positions to server under test. Check if appropriate results are returned if and only if the requirement is fulfilled, and an exception other-wise. Pass test if all checks succeed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req31
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req31:Send otherwise valid GetCoverage requests with matching and with violating slicing positions to server under test. Check if appropriate results are returned if and only if the requirement is fulfilled, and an exception otherwise. Pass test if all checks succeed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req32
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req32:For each coverage offered by the server on hand, send a valid GetCoverage request to server under test. Check that the result validates against gmlcov:AbstractCoverage. Test passes if all individual tests pass.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req33
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req33:For each coverage encoding format (i.e., format encoding extension) supported by the server under test: Send a valid GetCoverage request to retrieve a coverage in this format. Check that the result is a valid instance of the format indicated. Do so for both complete and subsetted coverages. Pass test if all checks succeed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req34
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req34:The response to a successful GetCoverage request with coverage identifier id shall consist of the coverage component of the OfferedCoverage identified by id, unless the server supports a WCS extension which over-rides this requirement.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req35
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req35:Send valid GetCoverage requests to the server under test with a single trimming as the only subsetting operation. Check correctness of the coverage response returned. Do so up to the maximum number of dimensions supported by the server and for subsetting dimensions at any position in the list of dimensions. Pass test if all checks succeed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req36
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req36:Send valid GetCoverage requests to the server under test with a single slicing as the only subsetting operation. Check correctness of the coverage response returned. Do so up to the maximum number of dimensions supported by the server and for subsetting dimensions at any position in the list of dimensions. Pass test if all checks succeed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req37
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req37:Pick some combination of trimming and slicing operations on a given coverage. Construct a set of GetCoverage requests by building all permutations of these subsetting operations. Compare the results of all requests whether the result returned is identical. Pass test if all checks succeed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req38
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req38: When a WCS server encounters an error while performing a GetCoverage operation it shall return an exception report message as specified.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req39
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req39:For every coverage identifier returned in a GetCapabilities response, Describe Coverage and GetCoverage requests on such an identifier shall always deliver information about the same OfferedCoverage object.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req24
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req24:Send a valid PostXML GetCoverage request to the server under test and check that the response is not an exception.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req24
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req24:Send a valid GetKVP GetCoverage request to the server under test and check that the response is not an exception.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] Tthe server does not support the gml coverage.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req24
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req24:Send a valid SOAP GetCoverage request to the server under test and check that the response is not an exception.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req25
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req25:Send a valid PostXML GetCoverage request to server under test which conforms to the references in the requirement. Check that the response is not an exception.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req25
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req25:Send a valid GetKVP GetCoverage request to server under test which conforms to the references in the requirement. Check that the response is not an exception.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] send a valid DescribeCoverage request, and the result should contain a wcs:CoverageDescriptions.
[FAILURE] send a valid GetKVP getCoverage request, and the result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] Tthe server does not support the gml coverage.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req25
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req25:Send a valid SOAP GetCoverage request to server under test which conforms to the references in the requirement. Check that the response is not an exception.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req26
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req26: Send valid PostXML GetCoverage requests to server under test addressing existing and non-existing coverages, resp. Check if appropriate results or excep-tions, resp., are delivered.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req26
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req26: Send valid GetKVP GetCoverage requests to server under test addressing existing and non-existing coverages, resp. Check if appropriate results or excep-tions, resp., are delivered.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The result should not be an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] The result should be an ows:ExceptionReport.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] Tthe server does not support the gml coverage.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:soap-core-req26
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req26: Send valid SOAP GetCoverage requests to server under test addressing existing and non-existing coverages, resp. Check if appropriate results or excep-tions, resp., are delivered.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req27
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req27:Send valid PostXML GetCoverage subsetting requests on all coverages on the server on hand. Check that for the disallowed subtypes an exception is returned and for the allowed subtypes a non-exception response.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-core-req27
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req27:Send valid GetKVP GetCoverage subsetting requests on all coverages on the server on hand. Check that for the disallowed subtypes an exception is returned and for the allowed subtypes a non-exception response.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] Tthe server does not support the gml coverage.

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req27:Send valid SOAP GetCoverage subsetting requests on all coverages on the server on hand. Check that for the disallowed subtypes an exception is returned and for the allowed subtypes a non-exception response.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req28
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req28:Every dimension value in a PostXML GetCoverage request shall be equal to one of the axisLabels dimension names specified in the gml:SRSInformationGroup of the coverage gml:Envelope, unless the server offers a WCS CRS extension which overrides this requirement.

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req28:Every dimension value in a GetKVP GetCoverage request shall be equal to one of the axisLabels dimension names specified in the gml:SRSInformationGroup of the coverage gml:Envelope, unless the server offers a WCS CRS extension which overrides this requirement.

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req29:A PostXML GetCoverage request shall contain at most one subsetting operation for each of the dimensions of the coverage addressed.

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req29:A SOAP GetCoverage request shall contain at most one subsetting operation for each of the dimensions of the coverage addressed.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req38
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req38: When a WCS server encounters an error while performing a PostXML GetCoverage operation it shall return an exception report message as specified.
